display_long_description:
--- **Rites of Wrath DLC Update** ---

Our new DLC (which was crafted thanks to a lot of fan feedback) lets players experience the Forsaken Lands like never before. We added two new modes, free to all players. Now you can play Skydance’s Behemoth’s incredible moments in bite-sized fashion.
[media]

**The Arena leaves Beta**

Arena Mode is now a fully fledged feature called “The Arena”. Fight off hordes of enemies through three new maps during both day and night. Collect coins from your fallen enemies, then exchange them for powerful golden weapons to reach new heights of mastery. Manage your weapons carefully though, because in The Arena weapons break, sometimes at the most inopportune moments! Conquer The Arena once, and unlock an Endless version of it, where you can find out what kind of a warrior you really are!
[media]

**The Behemoth Trials are coming for you**

Enter The Behemoth Trials and find yourself on hallowed ground. In this sacred space you can perform a ritual that will allow you to face any of the Behemoths of the campaign immediately, with bespoke loadouts that will maximize your chances of success. Choose to fight Shacklehide and call it a day, or challenge Nightscraper, Dreddstagg then Shacklehide one after the other! The order and number of Behemoths you want to tackle are your choice.

[media]

**The Arena leaves Beta**

Arena Mode is now a fully fledged feature called “The Arena”. Fight off hordes of enemies through three new maps during both day and night. Collect coins from your fallen enemies, then exchange them for powerful golden weapons to reach new heights of mastery. Manage your weapons carefully though, because in The Arena weapons break, sometimes at the most inopportune moments! Conquer The Arena once, and unlock an Endless version of it, where you can find out what kind of a warrior you really are!

**The Behemoth Trials are coming for you**

Enter The Behemoth Trials and find yourself on hallowed ground. In this sacred space you can perform a ritual that will allow you to face any of the Behemoths of the campaign immediately, with bespoke loadouts that will maximize your chances of success. Choose to fight Shacklehide and call it a day, or challenge Nightscraper, Dreddstagg then Shacklehide one after the other! The order and number of Behemoths you want to tackle are your choice.
